title: golden age
label: Branding
Web
Advertising
Conceptual
desc:
Golden Age Collectibles is a Vancouver-based
store that sells comics and memorabilia. This
re-brand and marketing campaign were based
around building a sense of community among
comic-lovers. The logo calls back to the ‘golden
age’ of comic books while the advertising and web
are made with a sense of play - comics are fun, a
comic store should be too!
